data.text: @teresawestcoast Yes, well loss of pets is universal and endemic on Twitter. Sadly we all get it. I just wish none of us had to hurt so much.❤️
@OracleNil You are the best, Denise. I knew you would understand. 💕💕💕💕💕💕
@teresawestcoast I can’t imagine. It will be so hard. You must just be spent. There’s something about a house after dogs have left, it never feels right. It’s awful. Wishing you tons of strength.
@Rbrock0619 Rosemarie, please let us know or DM me. We both talked about the moving thing, so I know you’re tired. Am so sorry.

@OracleNil Thank you .... Trying not to feel overwhelmed, but it's a bit much. 

Hanging in there. I'll do the right thing for her when the time comes. Her next vet appointment is later this month.
@OracleNil Yes, thank you so much for your empathy. Just really can’t take much more. Going home Thursday, but it’s going to be hard walking in the house without any of my babies. 🥲
@gablegirl1 Beautiful! Gardens, being outside is really important for mental health.
